title: Aikatsu!: Nerawareta Mahou no Aikatsu! Card
alternative_title: Aikatsu! Aiming for the Magical Aikatsu Card, アイカツ！〜ねらわれた魔法のアイカツ！カード〜
description: Short anime screened alongside Aikatsu Stars! Movie. The film and the short will mark the first time the franchise is screening a double feature.
genre: [<Genre -> Music>, <Genre -> School>, <Genre -> Shoujo>, <Genre -> Slice of Life>]
